channel.title: Data-Stack on Data Lab Tech TV
channel.description: Recent content in Data-Stack on Data Lab Tech TV

item.title: Migrating DuckLake Catalog From SQLite to PostgreSQL
item.description: Learn how to migrate your existing DuckLake catalog from SQLite to PostgreSQL, without losing any data, and see it in action in a production environment.

item.title: Data Lab Infra - Part 4: Core Services
item.description: Learn how to automate data stack deployment using docker compose and GitLab, setting up CI/CD variables with Terraform, and using GPU passthrough to a Docker VM running on Proxmox.

item.title: Data Lab Infra - Part 1: Architecture Design
item.description: Learn how to design a modern data stack, built for home labs, freelancing data experts, or general on-premise needs.
